newsitem.title: UK: Capital Corp has option to acquire Cromwell.
newsitem.headline: Capital Corp has option to acquire Cromwell.

text.p: Gaming firm Capital Corporation Plc said on Wednesday that it has acquired an option to buy private casino operator Cromwell Sporting Enterprises Ltd for 25 million stg.

Capital said the option would allow it to purchase the entire share capital of Cromwell. The deal could enable Capital to consolidate its position in the London casino market, giving it a prominent third operation if it used the option.
The Cromwell Mint casino is located in London's wealthy Knightsbridge district. It has 19 tables and six slot machines.

But Capital said in its statement it would wait for the outcome of a pending Monopolies and Mergers Commission (MMC) investigation into an offer made by London Clubs International Plc for Capital as well as hearing the President of the Board of Trade's view on it before acting on the Cromwell deal.
